FuncDef: This command configures ansdp-idassociated to the Ethernet-Segment. If the Ethernet-Segment is configured asall-active, thenonly a lag or PW port can be associated to the Ethernet-Segment. If the Ethernet-Segment is configured assingle-active, then lag, port or sdp can be associated to the Ethernet-Segment. In any case, only one of the four objects can be configured in the Ethernet-Segment. A specified SDP can be part of only one Ethernet-Segment. Only user-configured SDPs can be added to an Ethernet-Segment.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the IP address. Values-1 to 17407.
